archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.8: The security architecture should support an enterprise-wide process for implementing coherent and consistent security services (e.g. identity services, authentication services and cryptographic services) and establishing common user interfaces and Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
